songs.title: Telling It Like it Is
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Baby you should leave this girl alone
But you won't-won’t-won't
But you don't-don’t-don't
Now delete my number from your phone
But you won't-won't-won't
You gotta go-go-go
Oh my-my-my gonna spell it right out

[Chorus]
I don't know what you're looking for
But I don't think it’s me
I wish I could give you my all
Make believe
I don’t feel how you feel
I'm just telling it like it is
I don’t need you to say those words over
I'm just telling it like it is

[Verse 2]
Boy, man up you're not some animal
No no no, nono no
Rather die a thousand times tonight
Than take you home, than take you home
These walls I build they're never coming down

[Chorus]
I don’t know what you're looking for
But I don't think it's me
I wish I could give you my all
Make believe
I don't feel how you feel
I'm just telling it like it is
I don't need you to say those words over
I'm just telling it like it is

[Bridge]
I'm not messed up baby, I'm not heartless
Just not ready to start looking for apartments
I'm into shopping with no baby, no apartments
Bang, I tell it like it is
I'm not messed up baby, I'm not heartless
Just not ready to start looking for apartments
I'm into shopping with no baby, no apartments
Bang, I tell it like it is, I tell it like it is

[Chorus]
I don't know what you're looking for
But I don't think it's me
I wish I could give you my all
Make believe
I don't feel how you feel
I'm just telling it like it is
I don't need you to say those words over
I don't know what you're looking for
But I don't think it's me
I wish I could give you my all
Make believe
I don't feel how you feel
I'm just telling it like it is
I don't need you to say those words over
I'm just telling it like it is
